name: A path of Arrows
description:
In "A path of arrows", you must guide Love in order to make it reach people's hearts. However, not all hearts are worthy, some are filled with hatred and will destroy Love at the first occasion. There are, in total, 10 levels, some are very easy, others a lot less. Have fun. 

 This is my very first finished game. I made it for the Brackeys game jam. It was tough, but quite worth it!

Note: If you manage to finish the game, please let me know. It would make me really happy.
